summary: In World War II, a Romanian gentile peasant is denounced by the village gendarme and sent to a concentration camp for Jews where, due to an error, he's drafted into the S.S.

Warren|John Le Mesurier|Serge Reggiani|Robert Ayres|Robert Beatty|Stojan Decermic|Raoul Delfosse|Jean Desailly|Rada Djuricin|Marius Goring|Drewe Henley|Valentino Macchi|Jacques Marbeuf|Jacques Marin|Paul Maxwell|Dara Milosevic|Paul Pavel|Jacques Préboist|George Roderich|Françoise Rosay|Albert Rémy|Olga Schoberová|Viktor Starcic|Hénia Suchar|David Sumner|Wolfgang Völz|Bogdan Jakus|Billy Kearns|Branislav Radovic
keywords: peasant|based on novel|nazi concentration camp|ss|concentration camp
title: La hora 25
